00022 #include <stdio.h>

00026 #ifndef INLINE
00027 #if defined( _MSC_VER )

00031 #else

00036 /*-- external representation added to MCSTD ------------------------*/
00037 
00038 INLINE void came_cn(int *ext, const int b, const int c, const int n, const int a)
00039 {
00040    *ext = (b << 24 | (c << 16) | (n << 8) | a);
00041 }
00042 
00043 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 
00045 INLINE void came_ext(const int ext, int *b, int *c, int *n, int *a)
00046 {
00047    *b = (ext >> 24) & 0x7;
00048    *c = (ext >> 16) & 0x7;
00049    *n = (ext >> 8) & 0x1f;
00050    *a = (ext >> 0) & 0xf;
00051 }
00052

00054 *  ESONE functions                                                   *
00055 *********************************************************************/

00057 /*-- initialization ------------------------------------------------*/
00058 
00068 INLINE void ccinit(void)
00069 {
00070    cam_init();
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 
00084 INLINE int fccinit(void)
00085 {
00086    if (cam_init() == SUCCESS)
00087       return 1;
00088 
00089    return 0;
00090 }

00092 /*-- external representation ---------------------------------------*/
00093 
00109 INLINE void cdreg(int *ext, const int b, const int c, const int n, const int a)
00110 {
00111    came_cn(ext, b, c, n, a);
00112 }
00113 
00114 /*-- 16bit functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00115 
00132 INLINE void cssa(const int f, int ext, unsigned short *d, int *q)
00133 {
00134    int b, c, n, a, x;
00135 
00136    if (f < 8) {
00137       /* read */
00138       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00139       cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, d, &x, q);
00140    } else if (f > 15) {
00141       /* write */
00142       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00143       cam16o_q(c, n, a, f, *d, &x, q);
00144    } else if ((f > 7) || (f > 23)) {
00145       /* command */
00146       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00147       camc_q(c, n, a, f, q);
00148    }
00149 }
00150 
00151 /*-- 24bit functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00152 
00169 INLINE void cfsa(const int f, const int ext, unsigned long *d, int *q)
00170 {
00171    int b, c, n, a, x;
00172 
00173    if (f < 8) {
00174       /* read */
00175       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00176       cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, d, &x, q);
00177    } else if (f > 15) {
00178       /* write */
00179       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00180       cam24o_q(c, n, a, f, *d, &x, q);
00181    } else if ((f > 7) || (f > 23)) {
00182       /* command */
00183       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00184       camc_q(c, n, a, f, q);
00185    }
00186 }

00199 INLINE void cccc(const int ext)
00200 {
00201    int b, c, n, a;
00202 
00203    came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00204    cam_crate_clear(c);
00205 }

00238 INLINE void ccci(const int ext, int l)
00239 {
00240    int b, c, n, a;
00241 
00242    came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00243    if (l)
00244       cam_inhibit_set(c);

00246       cam_inhibit_clear(c);
00247 }

00329 INLINE void cdlam(int *lam, const int b, const int c, const int n,
00330                   const int a, const int inta[2])
00331 {
00332    /* inta[2] ignored */
00333    cdreg(lam, b, c, n, a);

00348 INLINE void ctgl(const int ext, int *l)
00349 {
00350    int b, c, n, a;
00351    unsigned long lam;
00352 
00353    came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00354    cam_lam_read(c, &lam);
00355    *l = (lam > 0);
00356 }

00370 INLINE void cclm(const int lam, int l)
00371 {
00372    int b, c, n, a;
00373 
00374    came_ext(lam, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00375 
00376    if (l)
00377       camc(c, n, 0, 26);
00378    else
00379       camc(c, n, 0, 24);
00380 }

00395 INLINE void cclnk(const int lam, void (*isr) (void))
00396 {
00397    int b, c, n, a;
00398 
00399    came_ext(lam, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00400 
00401    cam_interrupt_attach(c, n, isr);
00402    cam_lam_enable(c, n);
00403    cam_lam_clear(c, n);
00404 }

00459    int b, c, n, a;

00500 INLINE void cfga(int f[], int exta[], int intc[], int qa[], int cb[])
00501 {
00502    int i;
00503 
00504    for (i = 0; i < cb[0]; i++)
00505       cfsa(f[i], exta[i], (unsigned long *) (&(intc[i])), &(qa[i]));
00506 
00507    cb[1] = cb[0];
00508 }
00509 
00510 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00511 
00525 INLINE void csga(int f[], int exta[], int intc[], int qa[], int cb[])
00526 {
00527    int i;
00528 
00529    for (i = 0; i < cb[0]; i++)
00530       cssa(f[i], exta[i], (unsigned short *) (&(intc[i])), &(qa[i]));
00531 
00532    cb[1] = cb[0];
00533 }

00559 INLINE void cfmad(int f, int extb[], int intc[], int cb[])
00560 {
00561    int j, count;
00562    int x, q, b, c, n, a;
00563    unsigned long exts, extc, exte;
00564 
00565    exts = extb[0];
00566    exte = extb[1];
00567    count = cb[0];
00568    j = 0;
00569    came_ext(exts, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00570    do {
00571       cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, (unsigned long *) &intc[j], &x, &q);
00572       if (q == 0) {
00573          a = 0;                 /* set subaddress to zero */
00574          n++;                   /* select next slot */
00575          j++;
00576       } else {
00577          a++;                   /* increment address */
00578          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00579          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00580          --count;
00581       }
00582       came_cn((int *) &extc, b, c, n, a);
00583 
00584       if (extc > exte)
00585          count = 0;             /* force exit */
00586 
00587    } while (count);
00588 }
00589 
00590 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00591 
00614 INLINE void csmad(int f, int extb[], int intc[], int cb[])
00615 {
00616    int j, count;
00617    int x, q, b, c, n, a;
00618    unsigned long exts, extc, exte;
00619 
00620    exts = extb[0];
00621    exte = extb[1];
00622    count = cb[0];
00623    j = 0;
00624    came_ext(exts, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00625    do {
00626       cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, (unsigned short *) &intc[j], &x, &q);
00627       if (q == 0) {
00628          a = 0;                 /* set subaddress to zero */
00629          n++;                   /* select next slot */
00630          j++;
00631       } else {
00632          a++;                   /* increment address */
00633          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00634          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00635          --count;
00636       }
00637       came_cn((int *) &extc, b, c, n, a);
00638 
00639       if (extc > exte)
00640          count = 0;             /* force exit */
00641 
00642    } while (count);
00643 }

00646 
00661 INLINE void cfubc(const int f, int ext, int intc[], int cb[])
00662 {
00663    int count, q;
00664 
00665    count = cb[0];
00666    do {
00667       cfsa(f, ext, (unsigned long *) intc, &q);
00668       if (q == 0)
00669          count = 0;             /* stop on no q */
00670       else {
00671          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00672          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00673          --count;
00674       }
00675    } while (count);
00676 }
00677 
00678 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00679 
00694 INLINE void csubc(const int f, int ext, int intc[], int cb[])
00695 {
00696    int count, q;
00697 
00698    count = cb[0];
00699    do {
00700       cssa(f, ext, (unsigned short *) intc, &q);
00701       if (q == 0)
00702          count = 0;             /* stop on no q */
00703       else {
00704          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00705          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00706          --count;
00707       }
00708    } while (count);
00709 }

00728 INLINE void cfubr(const int f, int ext, int intc[], int cb[])
00729 {
00730    int q, count;
00731 
00732    count = cb[0];
00733    do {
00734       do {
00735          cfsa(f, ext, (unsigned long *) intc, &q);
00736       } while (q == 0);
00737 
00738       ++cb[1];                  /* increment tally count */
00739       ++intc;                   /* next data array */
00740       --count;
00741    } while (count);
00742 }
